content: अवच्छिन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Cut off. {@--2@} Separated, divided, detached, excerpted. {@--3@} (In Logic) Separated or excluded from all other things by the properties predicated of a thing as peculiar to itself. {@--4@} Bounded, modified, determined; दिक्कालाद्यनवच्छिन्न <ls>Bh. 2. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Particularized, distinguished, characterized, as by an attributive word.
